modName: Forest Green and brown Imperial Armor Retexture HD
summary:
---Forest Imperial Green and Brown armor HD
Retextures all the imperial armor to a brown and green forest colors. (See Pic\'s)
(Male and Female) 

Shot me some female pic\'s and other pic\'s to post.
descriptionHtml:
Forest Green and brown Imperial Armor Retexture by Aremeta, Ali Bengali, and draco1122


---Forest Imperial Green and Brown armor

Retextures all the imperial armor to a brown and green forest colors. (See Pic\'s)
(Male and Female) 

Shot me some female pic\'s and other pic\'s to post.

---Made possible by Perfect Legionnaire - Imperial Armor Reforged 4-0 by Ali Bengali and Aremeta\'s. Ali has given me permission to use his armor retexture as a base to make a green and brown armor retexture so please endorse his file as I have only re colored the armor he and aremeta did the hard part. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6085
---Mod goes great with Perfect Legionnaire - Imperial Armor Reforged 4-0 Just install after it and overwrite the textures.


-Install: Use NMM or unzip to data folder and check mod to activate.


Hope you all enjoy.



[color=yellow][u][b]My other mods[/b][/u][/color]
[color=yellow][u][b]Draco1122[/b][/u][/color]
